title: autofill
body:
why am i always being autofilled in ranked, like its never happened to anyone i know but its always happening to me and i find it hard to play ranked because im not a good support not that im bad but this is not fair, it feels like your trying to keep me down there but i would like to play the roles i pick and i can play well not a role that im not so great at, so i have been dodging cause like im in bronze 5 it dont matter but now i have a wait time cause im not allowed my main roles...
the main thing is why me everytime? had it twice in a row this morning and im not good at SUPPORT!!!
so a 30 min wait cause you wont let me play the roles im good at and force me to play support
